title: Date format in match history
body: I honestly don't know if this is relevant, but I was just checking out my match history and found that the date format is American style. Don't really think it's a big issue but I figured since we're in the OCE server it should be the non-American style.

replies.body: Not too sure about this, may be fixed when they release the beta. But good thing you bring it up now just in case :) Upvoted.
